text:
Hi All,

I can see many posts/knowledge articles for the - Importing Blogs from WordPress into HubSpot.
But I am unable to find anything how to- Import Website Pages and Files from WordPress into HubSpot.

So could you please share your experiences towards the migration of the same ?

Also one query appearing in my mind that, if website-pages can be imported into HubSpot from WordPress then how system will automatically recognize our custom-module and fill the values into it ? Is this what it will do ?

Or that to be done manually ?

Thanks in advance,
Mohesh Borah
